articles.description: Jade Butters, 23, Durham, County Durham, who claims she caught her ex-boyfriend 'messaging other women', got revenge by pouring 82 bottles of coloured glitter all over his home.
articles.content:
A woman who claims she caught her ex-boyfriend 'messaging other women' got revenge by pouring 82 bottles of coloured glitter all over his home.

articles.title: YouTuber Adalia Rose dies aged 15 from genetic condition - BBC News
articles.description: The teenager was diagnosed with Hutchinson-Gilford progeria when she was three months old.
articles.content:
Image source, Getty Images
YouTuber Adalia Rose has died at the age of 15 from a rare genetic condition.

articles.author: Lauren Lewis, Wires
articles.title: The world's great auction hero: Single page of a Spider-Man comic sells for a record $3.36MILLION - Daily Mail
articles.description: The record bidding for a single page, which started at $330,000 and soared past $3 million, came on the first day of Heritage Auctions' four-day comic event in Dallas, Texas, on Thursday.
articles.content:
A single page of artwork for a Spider-Man comic sold for a record $3.36million on Thursday, making the webslinger the world's mightiest auction superhero.
